Yarn Workspaces Monorepo - Verification Report

Date: November 11, 2025
Status: âœ… VERIFIED AND WORKING

Test Summaryâ€‹

A complete clean installation and dev server startup test was performed to verify the Yarn Workspaces monorepo setup.

Test Steps Performedâ€‹

  1. âœ… Removed all node_modules directories
  2. âœ… Removed all yarn.lock files
  3. âœ… Ran fresh yarn install
  4. âœ… Started yarn dev server
  5. âœ… Verified all three services running

Resultsâ€‹

1. Clean Installation âœ…â€‹

Command: yarn install

Results:

  • âœ… Single yarn install command installed all dependencies
  • âœ… Installation completed in 36 seconds
  • âœ… 1,448 packages resolved and installed
  • âœ… Single yarn.lock file created at root

Before (Old Setup):

/yarn.lock (root)
/docs/yarn.lock (docs)

After (New Setup):

/yarn.lock (root only)

2. Workspace Configuration âœ…â€‹

Command: yarn workspaces info

Output:

{
  "icjia-accessibility-status": {
    "location": "",
    "workspaceDependencies": [],
    "mismatchedWorkspaceDependencies": []
  },
  "icjia-accessibility-docs": {
    "location": "docs",
    "workspaceDependencies": [],
    "mismatchedWorkspaceDependencies": []
  }
}

Status: âœ… Both workspaces properly configured

3. Dev Server Startup âœ…â€‹

Command: yarn dev

Services Started:

ServicePortStatusDetails
Frontend (Vite)5173âœ… RunningReady in 332ms
Backend (Express)3001âœ… RunningServer running on http://localhost:3001
Docs (Docusaurus)3002âœ… RunningWebsite running at http://localhost:3002

Startup Output:

[0] VITE v5.4.21 ready in 332 ms
[0] âœ Local: http://localhost:5173/

[1] ğŸš€ Server running on http://localhost:3001
[1] â° Starting automatic key deactivation job (runs every 60 minutes)

[2] [SUCCESS] Docusaurus website is running at: http://localhost:3002/
[2] [webpackbar] âœ” Client: Compiled successfully in 4.54s

4. Port Verification âœ…â€‹

Command: lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN

Results:

node 61338 cschweda 31u IPv6 TCP [::1]:5173 (LISTEN)  â† Frontend
node 61346 cschweda 39u IPv6 TCP [::1]:3002 (LISTEN)  â† Docs
node 61367 cschweda 21u IPv6 TCP *:3001 (LISTEN)      â† Backend

Status: âœ… All three services listening on correct ports

Key Metricsâ€‹

MetricValue
Installation Time36 seconds
Packages Installed1,448
yarn.lock Files1 (root only)
Workspaces2 (root + docs)

Verification Checklistâ€‹

  • âœ… Single yarn install installs all dependencies
  • âœ… Only one yarn.lock file at root
  • âœ… Both workspaces properly configured
  • âœ… Frontend starts on port 5173
  • âœ… Backend starts on port 3001
  • âœ… Docs start on port 3002
  • âœ… All services start without errors
  • âœ… No missing dependencies
  • âœ… No version conflicts
  • âœ… Workspace commands work correctly

Conclusionâ€‹

âœ… The Yarn Workspaces monorepo setup is fully functional and verified.

The migration from separate yarn.lock files to a unified monorepo structure has been successful. All services start correctly, dependencies are properly managed, and the installation process is simplified.

Benefits Confirmedâ€‹

  1. Simplified Installation - Single command installs everything
  2. Consistent Versions - Single lock file prevents conflicts
  3. Faster Installation - 36 seconds for complete setup
  4. Better Maintenance - Centralized dependency management
  5. Standard Pattern - Follows monorepo best practices

Next Stepsâ€‹

Users can now:

  1. Clone the repository
  2. Run yarn install (single command)
  3. Run yarn dev to start all services
  4. Access frontend at http://localhost:5173
  5. Access docs at http://localhost:3002

No additional setup or navigation to subdirectories required!
